text: Barranco Minas Airport is an airport serving the river town of Barranco Minas in the Guainía Department of Colombia. The runway is adjacent to the Guaviare River and has of grass overrun available on its east end. ==See also== * * *Transport in Colombia *List of airports in Colombia ==References== ==External links== *OpenStreetMap - Barranco Minas *OurAirports - Barranco Minas *FallingRain - Barranco Minas Airport * Category:Airports in Colombia Category:Colombia transport-related lists
title: Barranco Minas Airport
